Room.Name: Paladin Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: Congratulations, you are ready to advance to the next level.
Room.LongDescription: Only the brave and pure are allowed to advance in the holy order of the paladins. You must be very proud of the order, yet humble in your own accomplishments. One day you will take your place in the council and look back at your adventures as a grand time in the Quest for Mordor.
